title: Responsive Form
description: This is an assignment by FreeCodeCamp. It demostrates a HTML5/CSS3 form which prioritizes user experience on mobile devices. The form includes familiar fields as designing an online form.

title: Responsive Landing Page
description: This is another responsive web design from FreeCodeCamp following 'mobile-first' priority in web development. The work shows typycal sections of a landing page.

title: Robotfriends
description: This project is provided by a course on Udemy illustrating the use of ReactJS along with Redux. The web app is able to fetch data from a provided API and store them in Redux store for use within whole app scope.

title: LMS Web App
description: This is the final assignment from CyberSoft Academy which requires learners to mimic a learning management system (LMS) with some basic functionalities. The project is required to be powered by React-Redux, yet is still under construction.
